articles.title: Exclusive -- President Trump Dismisses AI Economic Disruption Concerns
articles.summary: President Donald Trump told Breitbart News concerns over entry-level job losses due to the rise of artificial intelligence (AI) are misplaced, and there will be a surge in new jobs meant to build out the AI future.
articles.translated_title: Exclusive -- President Trump Dismisses AI Economic Disruption Concerns
articles.translated_summary: President Donald Trump told Breitbart News concerns over entry-level job losses due to the rise of artificial intelligence (AI) are misplaced, and there will be a surge in new jobs meant to build out the AI future.

articles.title: Abu Dhabi’s MGX Weighs Raising Billions for AI Investment Fund
articles.summary: Abu Dhabi-based MGX is considering plans to raise billions of dollars in third-party capital as it looks to ramp up investments in artificial intelligence, according to people familiar with the matter.
articles.translated_title: Abu Dhabi’s MGX Weighs Raising Billions for AI Investment Fund
articles.translated_summary: Abu Dhabi-based MGX is considering plans to raise billions of dollars in third-party capital as it looks to ramp up investments in artificial intelligence, according to people familiar with the matter.

articles.title: AMD Under Pressure to Show AI Gains With Stock Beating Nvidia
articles.summary: Advanced Micro Devices Inc. earnings are expected to show the chipmaker is increasingly benefiting from the artificial intelligence arms race. The question is whether it’s enough to justify a rally that has outpaced Nvidia Corp.’s performance this year.
articles.translated_title: AMD Under Pressure to Show AI Gains With Stock Beating Nvidia
articles.translated_summary: Advanced Micro Devices Inc. earnings are expected to show the chipmaker is increasingly benefiting from the artificial intelligence arms race. The question is whether it’s enough to justify a rally that has outpaced Nvidia Corp.’s performance this year.

articles.title: Can AI help me get a date? That's the wrong question
articles.summary: It's possible to ask artificial intelligence to enhance online dating profiles. But the question isn't can we, it's should we?
articles.translated_title: Can AI help me get a date? That's the wrong question
articles.translated_summary: It's possible to ask artificial intelligence to enhance online dating profiles. But the question isn't can we, it's should we?

articles.title: SoftBank Builds Nvidia, TSMC Stakes to Back AI Push Under Masayoshi Son
articles.summary: SoftBank Group Corp. is building up stakes in Nvidia Corp. and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co., the latest reflection of Masayoshi Son’s focus on the tools and hardware underpinning artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: SoftBank Builds Nvidia, TSMC Stakes to Back AI Push Under Masayoshi Son
articles.translated_summary: SoftBank Group Corp. is building up stakes in Nvidia Corp. and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co., the latest reflection of Masayoshi Son’s focus on the tools and hardware underpinning artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Billie Lourd Joins AI Movie 'Artificial' At Amazon MGM
articles.summary: Billie Lourd is set to join the cast of the Amazon MGM Studios AI pic 'Artificial'
articles.translated_title: Billie Lourd Joins AI Movie 'Artificial' At Amazon MGM

articles.title: The 'Star Wars' Slur That Has Been Mainstreamed by Anti-AI Discourse
articles.summary: 'Star Wars' has had a contentious relationship with artificial intelligences for a very long time—and now that we find ourselves staring down the barrel of generative AI, the galaxy far, far away has given us the surprising language to denigrate it.
articles.translated_title: The 'Star Wars' Slur That Has Been Mainstreamed by Anti-AI Discourse
articles.translated_summary: 'Star Wars' has had a contentious relationship with artificial intelligences for a very long time—and now that we find ourselves staring down the barrel of generative AI, the galaxy far, far away has given us the surprising language to denigrate it.

articles.title: Palantir Reports Sales Up 48%, Cites ‘Astonishing’ AI Impact
articles.summary:
Palantir Technologies Inc. reported a 48% increase in revenue for the second quarter to more than $1 billion, citing the “astonishing impact” of artificial technology on its business.  
The data software company also raised its revenue outlook for the full year to $4.14 billion to $4.15 billion, exceeding analysts’ prior expectation of $3.91 billion. 
The shares gained about 4% in extended trading after closing at $160.66 in New York. Denver-based Palantir has seen its stock price surge more than 500% over the past year — buoyed by high expectations from investors, growth in demand for AI tools and a deep reach into both the private and public sectors. The company’s $1 billion revenue in the period ended June 30 exceeded analysts’ average estimate of $939 million. It said growth was particularly strong in the US, where sales jumped 68% to $733 million. (Source: Bloomberg)

articles.title: A.I. Has Ushered in Silicon Valley’s ‘Hard Tech’ Era
articles.summary: Goodbye to the age of consumer websites and mobile apps. Artificial intelligence has ushered in an era of what insiders in the nation’s innovation capital call “hard tech.”
articles.translated_title: A.I. Has Ushered in Silicon Valley’s ‘Hard Tech’ Era
articles.translated_summary: Goodbye to the age of consumer websites and mobile apps. Artificial intelligence has ushered in an era of what insiders in the nation’s innovation capital call “hard tech.”

articles.title: Noted Tesla analyst Adam Jonas moving into new role at Morgan Stanley
articles.summary: Morgan Stanley auto analyst Adam Jonas will transition into a new internal role focusing on the artificial intelligence theme.
